SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM FAQ WHERE 1 = 1 FAQ_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') FAQ_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') FAQ_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') OR FAQ_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') AND FAQ_MAINCATEGORI = 'login' FAQ_MAINCATEGORI = 'product' FAQ_MAINCATEGORI = 'rental' FAQ_MAINCATEGORI = 'review' 1 = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.*, NI_NO, NI_PATH, NI_NAME from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 RN, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_VIEW, CASE WHEN gap <= 60 THEN '방금전' WHEN gap <= 60 * 24 THEN CONCAT(TRUNCATE( gap / 60, 0 ), '시간전') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') END AS NOTICE_REGDATE FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_VIEW, NOTICE_REGDATE, TRUNCATE( (NOW() - NOTICE_REGDATE) / 60, 0 ) AS gap FROM NOTICE WHERE
1 = 1 NOTICE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') NOTICE_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') NOTICE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') OR NOTICE_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')
ORDER BY
NOTICE_NO NOTICE_NO NOTICE_VIEW
DESC ) A ) B LEFT OUTER JOIN NOTICE_IMAGE I ON B.NOTICE_NO = I.NOTICE_NO, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) C WHERE RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) D ORDER BY RN ASC, NI_NO ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.*, FI_NO, FI_PATH, FI_NAME from ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 RN, FAQ_NO, FAQ_WRITER, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_MAINCATEGORI, FAQ_VIEW, CASE when gap <= 60 THEN '방금전' WHEN gap <= 60 * 24 THEN CONCAT(TRUNCATE( gap / 60, 0 ), '시간전') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(FAQ_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') END AS FAQ_REGDATE from ( SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_WRITER, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, FAQ_VIEW, FAQ_MAINCATEGORI, FAQ_REGDATE, TRUNCATE( (NOW() - FAQ_REGDATE) / 60, 0 ) AS gap FROM FAQ WHERE
FAQ_MAINCATEGORI = 'login' FAQ_MAINCATEGORI = 'product' FAQ_MAINCATEGORI = 'rental' FAQ_MAINCATEGORI = 'review' 1 = 1
AND
1 = 1 FAQ_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') FAQ_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') FAQ_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') OR FAQ_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')
ORDER BY
FAQ_NO FAQ_NO FAQ_VIEW
DESC ) A ) B LEFT OUTER JOIN FAQ_IMAGE I ON B.FAQ_NO = I.FAQ_NO, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) C where RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) D ORDER BY RN ASC, FI_NO ASC

SELECT B.*, QA_NO, QA_WRITER, QA_CONTENT FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 RN, QNA_NO, QNA_WRITER, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_MAINCATEGORI, QNA_TOW, QNA_VIEW, CASE WHEN gap <= 60 THEN '방금전' WHEN gap <= 60 * 24 THEN CONCAT(TRUNCATE( gap / 60, 0 ), '시간전') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(QNA_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') END AS QNA_REGDATE FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_WRITER, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_MAINCATEGORI, QNA_TOW, QNA_VIEW, QNA_REGDATE, TRUNCATE( (NOW() - QNA_REGDATE) / 60, 0 ) AS gap FROM QNA WHERE
QNA_MAINCATEGORI = 'login' QNA_MAINCATEGORI = 'product' QNA_MAINCATEGORI = 'rental' QNA_MAINCATEGORI = 'review' 1 = 1
AND
1 = 1 QNA_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') QNA_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') QNA_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%') OR QNA_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName},'%')
ORDER BY
QNA_NO QNA_NO QNA_VIEW
DESC ) A ) B LEFT OUTER JOIN QNA_ANSWER QA ON B.QNA_NO = QA.QNA_NO, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) C where RN > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ORDER BY RN ASC
